madhyama palath hindu sanskruthika katayuthu ha adhyapana (drawida) amathyanshaya wisin palathe wathu pasal 13k sandaha nawa godanangili 13k idikara atha.nuwaraeliye lamliyar, ambaagamuwa, tinshin stokhom, blumfild, sha/jondilari, loyinon nowud ayirabi ha udadumbara shiwaneswara demala widyalaya saha ambaagamuwa sha/jon bosko, pasbage kadireshan hindu balika, nawalapitiya hindu balika yana pasalwala nawa godanangili idikara thibe.pasal sisu sisuwiyan 2000kata pamana idakada sapayena paridi 'madhyama palathe wathu pasal sanwardhana wada satahana' yatathe idikala me godanangili sandaha ru: laksha 446 ka mudalak wayakara thibe..
